base_description: Silver, curved faucet with modern design.
part_description: Consists of a curved spout, cylindrical base, and lever handle. The spout is arch-shaped and attached to the top of the base. The lever is positioned on the side of the base.
internal_interaction_description: The lever handle controls the flow and temperature of water by adjusting the internal valves. When the lever is lifted or rotated, it opens the valve to allow water to pass through the spout, mixing hot and cold water as needed.
external_interaction_description: The faucet is typically mounted on a sink or countertop. Users interact with it by moving the lever to control water flow and temperature. It connects to plumbing to receive water supply and directs water into a basin or sink for various uses.
